sys_remote_update_set.description: add or remove member from group based on the user that are selected in group member field in catalog item "onboarding". Also change the manager of group if new manager is requested in item
sys_remote_update_set.name: Add Remove Members_V0.1

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Onboarding">194b7f2ddb09370019565d50cf9619db</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:b62cbb2ddb09370019565d50cf96196e</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>UpdateGroupMembers</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	var ga = new GlideAjax('PopulateGroupMembers');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','getGroupMembers');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_group',g_form.getValue('group'));
	ga.getXML(groupMembers);

	function groupMembers(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	//	alert(answer);
		g_form.setValue('group_members',answer);
	}
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-26 18:33:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>70cefbeddb09370019565d50cf9619c1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateGroupMembers</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_70cefbeddb09370019565d50cf9619c1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-26 18:35:00</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: custom function Pager(tableName, itemsPerPage) { this.tableName = tableName; this.itemsPerPage = itemsPerPage; this.currentPage = 1; this.pages = 0; this.inited = false; this.showRecords = function(from, to) { var rows = document.getElementById(tableName).rows; for (var i = 1; i < rows.length; i++) { if (i < from || i > to) { rows[i].style.display = 'none'; } else { rows[i].style.display = ''; } } } this.showPage = function(pageNumber) { if (! this.inited) { return; } var oldPageAnchor = document.getElementById('pg'+this.currentPage); oldPageAnchor.className = 'pg-normal'; this.currentPage = pageNumber; var newPageAnchor = document.getElementById('pg'+this.currentPage); newPageAnchor.className = 'pg-selected'; var from = (pageNumber - 1) * itemsPerPage + 1; var to = from + itemsPerPage - 1; this.showRecords(from, to); } this.prev = function() { if (this.currentPage > 1) { this.showPage(this.currentPage - 1); } } this.next = function() { if (this.currentPage < this.pages) { this.showPage(this.currentPage + 1); } } this.init = function() { var rows = document.getElementById(tableName).rows; var records = (rows.length - 1); this.pages = Math.ceil(records / itemsPerPage); this.inited = true; } this.showPageNav = function(pagerName, positionId) { if (! this.inited) { return; } var element = document.getElementById(positionId); var pagerHtml = ' « Prev '; for (var page = 1; page <= this.pages; page++) pagerHtml += '' + page + ' '; pagerHtml += ' Next »'; element.innerHTML = pagerHtml; } } " document.getElementById("qwerty").innerHTML = code; }]]>csp_instancefalsepaginationfalsePaginationfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2019-07-03 06:58:29e1107b1b2f5e330097f2f3ecf699b6a632Paginationglobalglobalsp_widget_e1107b1b2f5e330097f2f3ecf699b6a6admin2019-07-03 11:48:25

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_fe10ffbddbf5770019565d50cf9619d2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.onboardingFinal</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}

	var groupAjax = new GlideAjax('SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils');
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getRequestedAction');
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupName', g_form.getValue('var_group_name'));
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupMembersVariable', newValue.toString().split(','));
	groupAjax.addParam('sysparm_groupManager', g_form.getValue('var_current_manager'));
	groupAjax.getXML(setRequestedAction);

	function setRequestedAction(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		g_form.setValue('requested_action',answer);

	}	
}</description><name>onboardingFinal</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Utility class for change request client side calls
 * 
 * @class 
 * @author Harish Murikinati [S02W42]
 * @extends global.module:sys_script_include.AbstractAjaxProcessor
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script_include
 */
var SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils = Class.create();
SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, /** @lends global.module:sys_script_include.SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils.prototype */ {

	/**
	 * Get the assignment group based on the configuration id selected on the change request
	 * 
	 * @returns {undefined} Sys ID of Assignment Group Name
	 */
	getAssignmentGroup: function () {

		var ciAssignmentGroup = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci");
		ciAssignmentGroup.addQuery("sys_id", this.getParameter("sysparm_configuration_item_sysID"));
		ciAssignmentGroup.query();
		if (ciAssignmentGroup.next()) {
			return ciAssignmentGroup.getValue("assignment_group");
		} else {
			return "";
		}
	},

	/**
	 * Validate planned start date is future date
	 * 
	 * @returns {String} numeric value of date diff
	 */
	isValidStartDate: function () {

		var startdate = new GlideDateTime();
		startdate.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_plannedStartDate'));

		var currentdate = new GlideDateTime();
		currentdate.setDisplayValue(gs.nowDateTime());

		var sdateinseconds = parseInt(startdate.getNumericValue()) / 1000;
		var cdateinseconds = parseInt(currentdate.getNumericValue()) / 1000;
		return (parseInt(sdateinseconds) - parseInt(cdateinseconds)) < 0;
	},

	/**
	 * Get all groups which user is member of or manger of the group
	 * 
	 * @returns {String} Sysid of the groups
	 */
	getMyGroups: function () {
		var currentUserSysid = gs.getUserID();
		var allMyGroups = [];
		var userGroupRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user_group");
		userGroupRecord.addQuery("manager", currentUserSysid);
		userGroupRecord.query();
		while (userGroupRecord.next()) {
			allMyGroups.push(userGroupRecord.getValue("sys_id"));
		}

		var groupMember = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
		groupMember.addQuery("user", currentUserSysid);
		groupMember.query();
		while (groupMember.next()) {

			allMyGroups.push(groupMember.getValue("group"));

		}
		return allMyGroups.toString();
	},

	/**
	 * Get group manager and members based on the Group name selected on catalog item
	 * 
	 * @param {String} sysparm_group Sys Id of the group
	 * @returns {String} JSON string with Group members and group manager
	 */
	getGroupDetails: function () {

		var answer={}; 
		var groupName = this.getParameter("sysparm_group");
		answer.groupMembers = this._getGroupMembers(groupName);
		answer.groupManager = this._getGroupManager(groupName);
		return  JSON.stringify(answer);
	},
	/**
	 * Get all the group members
	 * 
	 * @param {String} groupSysId Sys Id of the group
	 * @returns {String} Comma separated sys ids of members of group
	 */
	_getGroupMembers: function(groupSysId){
		var users = [];
		var grGroupMembers = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
		grGroupMembers.addQuery('group', groupSysId);
		grGroupMembers.addNotNullQuery('group');
		grGroupMembers.query();
		while (grGroupMembers.next()) {
			users.push(grGroupMembers.getValue('user'));
		}
		return users.toString();
	},
	/**
	 * Get group manager
	 * 
	 * @param {String} groupSysId Sys ID of the group
	 * @returns {String} Sys ID of the Manager
	 */
	_getGroupManager: function(groupSysId){
		if (gs.nil(groupSysId)) {
			return '';
		}
		var grManager = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
		grManager.addQuery('sys_id',groupSysId);
		grManager.addNotNullQuery('manager');
		grManager.query();
		if (grManager.next()){
			return grManager.getValue('manager');
		} else {
			return '';
		}
	},

	getRequestedAction: function(){
		var groupName = this.getParameter("sysparm_groupName");
		var groupMembersVariable = this.getParameter("sysparm_groupMembersVariable");
		var groupManager = this.getParameter("sysparm_groupManager");


		var groupMembersDatabase = (function (groupName, groupManager){
			var groupMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
			groupMember.addNotNullQuery('group');
			groupMember.addQuery('group', groupName);
			groupMember.addQuery('user', '!=', groupManager);
			groupMember.query();
			var user= [];
			while(groupMember.next()){
				user.push(groupMember.user.toString());
			}
			return user;
		})(groupName, groupManager);

		var removeMember = groupMembersDatabase.toString().split(',').filter(function(userId){
			return (groupMembersVariable.indexOf(userId)==-1);
		});
		var grRemoveMember = this._getUserName(removeMember);

		var addedmembers = groupMembersVariable.toString().split(',').filter(function(userId){
			return (groupMembersDatabase.indexOf(userId)==-1);
		});
		var grAddMember = this._getUserName(addedmembers);

		var message = gs.getMessage('Members to Add : {0} and Members to remove : {1}', [grAddMember.join(),grRemoveMember.join()]);
		return message;
	},

	_getUserName: function(userSysId){
		var namesArray = [];
		var  grUserName = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grUserName.addQuery('sys_id','IN', userSysId);
		grUserName.query();
		while (grUserName.next()){
			namesArray.push(grUserName.name.toString());
		}
		return namesArray;
	},
	type: 'SR_ChangeRequestAjaxUtils'
});

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-03 18:36:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>fe10ffbddbf5770019565d50cf9619d2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onboardingFinal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fe10ffbddbf5770019565d50cf9619d2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-03 18:37:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b5b2b8cadb85770019565d50cf961972
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.New Onboarding RunScript</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>New Onboarding RunScript</name><script><![CDATA[
var groupName = current.variables.group;
var groupMembers = current.variables.group_members;
gs.info('groupName : '+groupName);
var groupMembersArray=[];
var groupTableMembers=[];
groupMembersArray=groupMembers.toString().split(',');


groupTableMembers=(function (){
var groupTableArr=[];
	var groupTable =new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	groupTable.addQuery('group',groupName);
	groupTable.query();
	while(groupTable.next()){
		groupTableArr.push(groupTable.getValue('user'));
	}
return groupTableArr;	
})();

gs.info('groupMembersArray :'+groupMembersArray);
gs.info('groupTableMembers :'+groupTableMembers);

function addRemoveUser(groupMembersArray,groupTableMembers){
	//var groupTableFinalList=new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	//groupTableFinalList.addQuery('group',groupName);
	//groupTableFinalList.query();
	groupMembersArray.forEach(function(item){
		if(groupTableMembers.indexOf(item)==-1){
gs.info('item : '+item);
                     var groupTableFinalListAdd=new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
			groupTableFinalListAdd.initialize();
			groupTableFinalListAdd.setValue("group", groupName.toString());
			groupTableFinalListAdd.setValue("user", item);
			groupTableFinalListAdd.insert();
		}
	});
	
	groupTableMembers.forEach(function(item){
		if(groupMembersArray.indexOf(item)==-1){
                        var groupTableFinalListRemove=new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
			groupTableFinalListRemove.addQuery('group',groupName);
			groupTableFinalListRemove.addQuery('user',item);
			groupTableFinalListRemove.query();
                        groupTableFinalListRemove.next();
                        groupTableFinalListRemove.deleteRecord();
		}
		
	});
};


addRemoveUser(groupMembersArray,groupTableMembers);               ]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-27 16:40:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>b5b2b8cadb85770019565d50cf961972</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New Onboarding RunScript</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b5b2b8cadb85770019565d50cf961972</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-27 16:40:55</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Onboarding">194b7f2ddb09370019565d50cf9619db</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:42cc33addb09370019565d50cf9619b4</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>setRequestedAction</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
		
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OnboardingSetMessage'); 
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name','setMessage');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_groupName',g_form.getValue('group'));
	ga.addParam('sysparm_groupMembers',newValue.toString().split(','));
	ga.getXML(getMessage);
	function getMessage(response) {
		var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		//alert(answer);
		g_form.setValue('requested_action',answer);
	}

	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>RV</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-06-01 19:35:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c3c72191db3df30019565d50cf9619bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setRequestedAction</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c3c72191db3df30019565d50cf9619bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-06-03 18:12:12</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.PopulateGroupMembers</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>PopulateGroupMembers</name><script><![CDATA[var PopulateGroupMembers = Class.create();
PopulateGroupMembers.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
getGroupMembers : function() {
	var grmembers=[];
	var group=this.getParameter('sysparm_group');
   var grGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
   grGroup.addQuery('group', group);
   grGroup.query();
while(grGroup.next()){
	grmembers.push(grGroup.user.sys_id);
}
return grmembers.join();
     },
    type: 'PopulateGroupMembers'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>AG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-26 18:28:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>9530c8fddb09370019565d50cf9619ca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PopulateGroupMembers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9530c8fddb09370019565d50cf9619ca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>AG</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-26 18:28:48</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
